name: Stake DAO
introduce:
Stake DAO protocol is a decentralized asset management platform that offers users simplified access to various yield farming strategies, staking, trading, and metrics on a single dashboard.
Stake DAO curates the top strategies, staking protocols, and more, into one intuitive dashboard, offering users an easy way to earn more from their assets. Every strategy has a carefully weighted risk score, enabling everyone to participate on their own terms and risk appetites.
